thread.section_title: Hotel Vaneau Saint Germain - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great place!
thread.title_full: Great place! - Review of Hotel Vaneau Saint Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Irkutsk22
title: Great place!
text:
This is a very good hotel:
Location near or well connected with the tourist attractions and museums, but not inundated by tourists.
Plenty of excellent restaurants and cafes in all price categories.
Convenient shopping.
Nice parks not far from the hotel.
Handy grocery stores...
The staff is friendly and welcoming - I got help with booking an appointment at the local salon de coiffure via email - thanks to Rose!
I loved the view from the window on the street and even the street noise - this is Paris !!!
Some minor improvements in the shower cabin - a shelf for toiletries- would make it even better.
Also, the room cleaning schedule was not very fortunate for me, but no big deal.
Breakfast is decent, but a bit expensive for what it is, but no shortage of options around.
Highly recommended, and on my list of favorites for future visits.
